abstract: Budget deficits and protection? Been there, done that.
lead_paragraph: It’s hard to focus on ordinary economic analysis amidst this political apocalypse. But getting and spending will still consume most of peoples’ energy and time; furthermore, like it or not the progress of CASE NIGHTMARE ORANGE may depend on how the economy does. So, what is actually likely to happen to trade and manufacturing over the next few years?
snippet: Budget deficits and protection? Been there, done that....
